name: Zombie Prison Escape
description:
Get ready for a creepy and frighting zombie horror game!

A zombie apocalypse has broken out right in the middle of your shift as a prison security guard! You need to escape before the zombies find you, but first you must find the objects hidden around the prison. Use the security cameras to locate the missing objects, but be quick as you only have till 5:00 A.M.

Will you be able to escape from the prison?

FEATURES:
* Creepy and frighting zombie horror experience
* Use security cameras to watch zombies and find objects
* Lot’s of jump scares :)
* Will you survive the night?

If you like scary games, then you will love ‘Zombie Prison Escape’!
